name: Sudoku (itch) (Serge's Games)
description:
Sudoku is a classic puzzle game where the goal is to fill the 9×9 grid with numbers so that each row, column and 3×3 block contain all of the digits between 1 and 9. A single digit must appear in only one column, row and 3x3 block at a time.

This game features:
- 3 variant difficulty options suitable for all players
- Instant replay animation
- Multiple glow theme options
- Rainbow animation option
- Hint ability
- Highscore

Rainbow animation
Toggle rainbow animation in Options from the Start screen

Controls
Mouse / Touch

This game is mobile touch friendly. Control the board by tapping

Play the game fullscreen here:
